title: This Photo Has Fans Convinced Beyonc√© Will Show Up At The Super Bowl With Lady Gaga
text:
This Photo Has Fans Convinced Beyonc√© Will Show Up At The Super Bowl With Lady Gaga Or is it just a perfect illusion? 02/02/2017 10:23 am ET Julia Brucculieri Entertainment Writer, The Huffington Post 
In January, sweet dreams of a Super Bowl collaboration between Lady Gaga and Beyonc√© were crushed when Billboard reported the ‚ÄúBorn This Way‚Äù singer would be taking the stage alone . 
On Wednesday, though, Gaga shared a photo on Instagram that‚Äôs giving fans new hope. 
In the shot, the pop star is sitting on a patio chair, soaking up what looks to be the beautiful weather. But it‚Äôs the caption that‚Äôs got fans buzzing. 
‚ÄúHouston, you are beautiful,‚Äù she wrote, along with a bee emoji. A photo posted by xoxo, Joanne (@ladygaga) on Feb 1, 2017 at 12:17pm PST 
Of course, fans are convinced the bee is an obvious nod to Queen Bey. The Beyhive has been using the bee emoji for years to show their love for the singer. Then there‚Äôs the Houston aspect ‚Äï yes, its where the big game will take place on Sunday, but it also happens to be where Beyonc√© is from. 
Does this mean Gaga has a secret plan to bring pregnant ( with twins! ) Bey out onstage with her? It‚Äôs unclear. At this point, Gaga‚Äôs post is just fueling the rumors, and it‚Äôs likely we won‚Äôt know if the two will perform together until Sunday, when the halftime show airs. 
Regardless, we know Gaga will put on a great performance. Judging by her Instagram account, she‚Äôs been spending a lot of time prepping. A photo posted by xoxo, Joanne (@ladygaga) on Jan 31, 2017 at 2:24pm PST A video posted by xoxo, Joanne (@ladygaga) on Jan 16, 2017 at 2:18pm PST 
‚ÄúI‚Äôve been planning this since I was 4, so I know exactly what I‚Äôm going to do,‚Äù Gaga said in a behind-the-scenes clip . ‚ÄúFor me, it‚Äôs all about giving to the fans and bringing people together that wouldn‚Äôt normally come together.‚Äù Hold on to your hats! Your first look #BTS of #PepsiHalftime as @RICHYSQUIRREL gets @LadyGaga 's dancers ready to make us üôÄüôÄüôÄ Feb 5th! pic.twitter.com/NlteGrS7Wa 
Beyonc√© or not, we can‚Äôt wait. Also on HuffPost Lady Gaga's most shocking moments Lady Gaga's most shocking moments 1
